example.eg: Although any European could qualify, it was a Spaniard in this instance.
example.egtrans: 尽管任何欧洲人都有资格，但在这个情况下是一名西班牙人入选。

example.eg: This is an instance of misuse of power.
example.egtrans: 这是一个滥用权力的例子。

example.eg: The case needs to be heard by a court of higher instance.
There are still sizable populations of bears in Europe, for instance in the Balkans.
example.egtrans: 欧洲仍然有着数量可观的熊类，比方在巴尔干半岛地区。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 举例来说，例如, 譬如，比方

example.eg: I wouldn't say she was to blame in every instance, no.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 每一次, 在每一种情况下

example.eg: In the first instance, the project would be expensive, and in the second instance, we do not have the equipment.
I don't normally drink alcohol but in this instance I'll have a glass of champagne to toast the bride and groom.
